title: Annual Choreography Showcase 2015
desc: Presented by the  Steffi Nossen Dance Foundation,  the Annual Choreography Showcase features new works from notable choreographers from across the region. Produced by Artistic Director Jessica DiMauro, featured choreographers and companies include:  Featured Choreographers and Companies Jessica DiMauro-DiMauro Dance Jacqueline Dugal-Steffi Nossen Choreography Showcase Ensemble Gierre Godley-PROJECT 44 with Steffi Nossen Residency Participants Annmaria Mazzini-Mazzini Dance Collective Cameron McKinney-Kizuna ? Dance Caterina Rago-Steffi Nossen Dance Company Sabatino Verlezza-Steffi Nossen Dance Company Indah Walsh-Indah Walsh Dance Company A Q&A session with the choreographers will follow the performance ? Photo by Stephanie Crousillat
